snippet: The Marine Corps is assessing female volunteers in a grueling training course to see whether women can make it in the infantry.
abstract: Marine Corps is putting women through its Infantry Officer Course, grueling training experience designed to determine whether a soldier is suitable for infantry duty; Corp hopes that the experiences of these officers will provide crucial clues about the future of women in the infantry, a possibility allowed by the recent lifting of the 1994 ban on women in direct combat units.
lead_paragraph: The Marine Corps is assessing female volunteers in a grueling training course to see whether women can make it in the infantry.

headline.seo: Marines Look to Infantry Course for Insight on Women
headline.main: In Arduous Officer Course, Women Offer Clues to Their Future in Infantry
headline.print_headline: In Arduous Officer Course, Women Offer Clues to Their Future in Infantry

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
